author: Rosie
description:
UpdateBot (starbotUpdate) is a cog for updating your bot from within discord. When combined with the ability to restart the bot, updating starbot becomes a easier than ever!

You can choose from multiple automatic versions, or specify a particular version you'd like to install.
install_msg: Thanks for installing `starbotupdate`. See `[p]help UpdateBot` and `[p]help update` for details.
short: A command to update your bot!!
